# Revolt

Open-source, self-hostable chat platform (Discord alternative).

Full control over your server, end-to-end encryption possible, no central owner.

Perfect for small to medium communities.

See also → [Matrix](/EN/concepts/matrix) · [Thesis 20](/EN/theses/thesis-20) · [revolt.chat](https://revolt.chat/)
